mapper.sql: WAREHOUSE_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_AMOUNT, WAREHOUSE_TYPE, WAREHOUSE_AREA, WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS, EXPECTED_SERVICE, "STATUS", CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_MOBILE, APPLY_RESOURCE
mapper.select:
SELECT BREED_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_CNAME FROM boss.breed t1 where 1=1
and (t1.BREED_NAME = #{_parameter} OR t1.BREED_CNAME = #{_parameter})
and t1.status=1
mapper.insert: insert into ZYC.BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY (WAREHOUSE_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_AMOUNT, WAREHOUSE_TYPE, WAREHOUSE_AREA, WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS, EXPECTED_SERVICE, "STATUS", CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_MOBILE, APPLY_RESOURCE) values (ZYC.SEQ_BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY.NEXTVAL, #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ZYC.BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY
WAREHOUSE_ID, BREED_NAME, BREED_AMOUNT, WAREHOUSE_TYPE, WAREHOUSE_AREA, WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS, EXPECTED_SERVICE, "STATUS", CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, APPLY_NAME, APPLY_MOBILE, APPLY_RESOURCE, BREEDID,
ZYC.SEQ_BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY.NEXTVAL, #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{breedId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update ZYC.BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY
BREED_NAME = #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BREED_AMOUNT = #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_TYPE = #{warehouseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_AREA = #{warehouseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS = #{warehouseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPECTED_SERVICE = #{expectedService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"STATUS" = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_NAME = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_MOBILE = #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPLY_RESOURCE = #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZYC.BUSI_WAREHOUSE_APPLY set BREED_NAME = #{breedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BREED_AMOUNT = #{breedAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_TYPE = #{warehouseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_AREA = #{warehouseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS = #{warehouseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPECTED_SERVICE = #{expectedService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "STATUS" = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_NAME = #{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_MOBILE = #{applyMobile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLY_RESOURCE = #{applyResource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
